short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Queue and listen to releases as you browse Discogs. Dig faster with Shovel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shovel is a music player that lives in the Chrome side panel. It makes it fast and easy to listen to releases as you're browsing. Click the Shovel button next to a release on Discogs to add it to your listening queue.

Shovel works on every key page on Discogs - Artists, Labels, Sellers, Search, Lists and more.

No more opening tabs to listen to a release.

Your queue persists as you browse different pages or even leave Discogs. So you can create a playlist and then let Shovel autoplay. Or you can quickly skip through tracks.

YouTube videos load first time! And broken links are automatically skipped.

Connect your YouTube account and add to playlists directly from Shovel.

Happy digging!
